page.description: Fires before an Ajax callback to navigate to a different page of records.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object that contains the following properties:

property.name: direction
property.description: The navigation direction. Will be one of the following: 'f' (first), 'p' (previous), 'n' (next), 'l' (last), or 'pageNumber'.
